name: Gravity Quest
description:
Plunge into the world of magic 3d mazes! Feel deeply this fairy world free of gravitation.

In Gravity Quest you will need to plough your way, moving parts of the maze. Travel in the maze, find portals and make teleportations. You will be charmed by new, more attractive and mysterious mazes!

  • 12 amazing mazes
  • 4 types of fantasy environment
  • Beutiful musical accompaniment
  • Relaxing atmosphere

You will be thrilled by all this! This is magical!
